remarks: Every element in the range of ` C ` is a finite set .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
etransclem16.c $e |- C = ( n e. NN0 |-> { c e. ( ( 0 ... n ) ^m ( 0 ... M ) ) | sum_ j e. ( 0 ... M ) ( c ` j ) = n } ) $.
etransclem16.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
etransclem16 $p |- ( ph -> ( C ` N ) e. Fin ) $.
$d M c n $.
$d N c n $.
$d j n $.
$d n ph $.
